titleStmt.title: The Epistles and Gospelles with a brief postil vpon the same from after Easter tyll Aduent, which is the somer parte set forth for the singuler cōmoditie of all good Christen men and namely of prestes and curates.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Richarde Bankes, and are to be solde in Fletestrete next the signe of the Whyte Hart,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's information from colophon. Date of publication from STC.
Bound with: The epistles and gospelles (STC 2968).
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
